original_text: Saul was staying near Gibeah. He sat under a big fruit tree at Migron. There were about 600 soldiers with him.
korean_text: 사울이 기브아 변두리 미그론에 있는 석류나무 아래에 머물렀고 함께 한 백성은 육백 명 가량이며

sentences.original_text: He sat under a big fruit tree at Migron.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 미그론에 있는 큰 과일나무 아래 앉아 있었습니다.

sentences.original_text: There were about 600 soldiers with him.
